name: Mayes C Rubeo
description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

key_work.title: Mayes C Rubeo
key_work.brief_description: Mayes C Rubeo is no stranger to MCU, having worked on WandaVision and Thor: Ragnarok before Thor: Love and Thunder, but her costume design credentials include some of the biggest blockbusters.

start.title: Mayes C Rubeo
start.brief_description: Mayes C Rubeo is no stranger to MCU, having worked on WandaVision and Thor: Ragnarok before Thor: Love and Thunder, but her costume design credentials include some of the biggest blockbusters.

end.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
end.brief_description: Thor: Love and Thunder sees Thor (Chris Hemsworth) embark on a journey of self-discovery – which is suddenly interrupted by a galactic killer, Gorr the God Butcher (Christian Bale), who seeks to eliminate the gods.

constellations_other.name: Marvellous and magic MCU inventions
constellations_other.description: In Thor: Love and Thunder, the iconic weapons Mjölnir and Stormbreaker are joined by new additions like Zeu's Thunderbolt - they're just a long line of enchanted and technologically advanced weapons in movies.

constellations_other.name: Physical transformation and the formation of character
constellations_other.description: Christian Bale is hardly recogniseable as villain Gorr the God Butcher in Thor: Love and Thunder. It’s just another instance of the actor drastically changing his appearance to inhabit a character – and he’s not the only one.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: Maya C Rubeo is the Oscar-nominated costume designer on Marvel Studios’ Thor: Love and Thunder. It was the biggest Thor movie, costume-wise, to date, with the titular character alone having 25 outfits.

start.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
start.brief_description: Thor: Love and Thunder sees Thor (Chris Hemsworth) embark on a journey of self-discovery – which is suddenly interrupted by a galactic killer, Gorr the God Butcher (Christian Bale), who seeks to eliminate the gods.

constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

end.title: Thor: Ragnarok
end.brief_description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of a powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: Key to the success of the out-of-this-world costumes in Thor: Love and Thunder is the continued collaboration between Rubeo and the team who had worked on Taika Waiti’s previous Marvel outing, Thor: Ragnarok.

end.title: Apocalypto
end.creator_credit: Mel Gibson, Mayes C. Rubeo, Bruce Davey, Sergio Miranda, Icon Entertainment International, Icon Productions, Touchstone Pictures, Thomas E. Sanders, Cris Borgnine   , J.M. Logan and Farhad Safinia
end.brief_description: Set in the Mayan civilization, when a man’s idyllic presence is brutally disrupted by a violent invading force, he is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression where a harrowing end awaits him

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: The title of Thor: Ragnarok (spoilers!) refers to the Norse notion of the world ending. A key part of the film is the destruction of Asgard. Rubeo also worked on an apocalyptic themed film – Apocalypto – where the end of the world comes in the form of Spanish conquistadors.

start.title: Apocalypto
start.creator_credit: Mel Gibson, Mayes C. Rubeo, Bruce Davey, Sergio Miranda, Icon Entertainment International, Icon Productions, Touchstone Pictures, Thomas E. Sanders, Cris Borgnine   , J.M. Logan and Farhad Safinia

end.title: WandaVision
end.creator_credit: Mayes C. Rubeo, Chuck Hayward, Marvel Studios and Mark Worthington
end.brief_description: Wanda Maximoff and Vision—two super-powered beings living idealized suburban lives—begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: Back in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, Rubeo won an Emmy for designing colourful and kitschy costumes for the hit TV show WandaVision. It detailed a personal apocalypse of sorts – stricken by grief, Wanda destroys one world to create her own.

start.title: WandaVision
start.creator_credit: Mayes C. Rubeo, Chuck Hayward, Marvel Studios and Mark Worthington
start.brief_description: Wanda Maximoff and Vision—two super-powered beings living idealized suburban lives—begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

end.title: Jojo Rabbit
end.creator_credit: Carthew Neal, Chelsea Winstanley and Taika Waititi
end.headline_credit: Czech Republic, New Zealand and United States of America, 2019
end.brief_description: A World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother is hiding a young Jewish girl in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler, Jojo must confront his blind nationalism.

constellations_other.name: Faking history
constellations_other.description: The Great takes a creative approach to its historical characters and settings that is mirrored in its costumes - this war dress might have a classic silhouette, but the grimy pearlescent fabric and striking oxblood detailing is completely modern. Faking history is a time-honoured tradition in film, from historical fiction to propaganda.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: Aside from winning an Emmy for WandaVision, Rubeo was nominated for both an Oscar and a BAFTA for her costume design in JoJo Rabbit, which was her first time working with Thor director Taika Waititi.

start.title: Warcraft
start.creator_credit: Chris Metzen, Alex Gartner, Charles Roven, Jon Jashni, Tessa Ross and Thomas Tull
start.headline_credit: Canada, China, Japan and United States of America, 2016

video_links.name: Warcraft: The Beginning – Official Movie Trailer (Universal Pictures)

start.brief_description: The realm of Azeroth stands on the brink of war as its civilization faces a fearsome race of invading orcs fleeing their dying home to colonize another. As a portal opens to connect the two worlds, one army faces destruction and the other faces extinction.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

constellations_other.name: Blizzard, Bowie and the Bonets
constellations_other.description: Overwatch is the beginning of some surprising connections in this Constellation that explores videogame movies, cartoons, and music docos and shows.

end.title: World of Warcraft
end.brief_description:
Four years have passed since the aftermath of Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos, and a great tension now smolders throughout the ravaged world of Azeroth. As the battle-worn races begin to rebuild their shattered kingdoms, new threats, both ancient and ominous, arise to plague the world once again. World of Warcraft is an online role-playing experience set in the award-winning Warcraft universe. Players assume the roles of Warcraft heroes as they explore, adventure, and quest across a vast world. Being “Massively Multiplayer,” World of Warcraft allows thousands of players to interact within the same world. Whether adventuring together or fighting against each other in epic battles, players will form friendships, forge alliances, and compete with enemies for power and glory. A dedicated live team will create a constant stream of new adventures to undertake, lands to explore, and monsters to vanquish. This content ensures that the game will never be the same from month to month, and will continue to offer new challenges and adventures for years to come.

This game has a monthly online fee. Adventure together with thousands of other players simultaneously. Explore an expansive world with miles of forests, deserts, snow-blown mountains, and other exotic lands. Join the Horde or the Alliance as one of 8 playable races. Select from 9 classes, including holy Paladins, shape-shifting Druids, powerful Warriors and Mages, demon-summoning Warlocks, and more. Encounter many familiar and new Warcraft characters and monsters. Learn the continuing story of Azeroth by completing a wide variety of challenging quests. Journey through an epic world filled with dungeons of different styles and depths. Explore 6 huge capital cities, which serve as major hubs for the races inhabiting them. Practice various trade skills to help locate reagents, make and enhance custom items, acquire wealth through trade with other players, and more. Purchase tickets for travel along a number of air routes flown by creatures such as Gryphons and Wyverns. For global transportation, travel by Boat or Goblin Zeppelin. Once a certain level has been achieved, players can choose to purchase permanent personal mounts, such as Dire Wolves and Horses. Establish a guild, purchase a custom guild tabard, and promote or demote recruits to different ranks within the guild. Locate and engage other players with easy-to-use features and tools, including chat channels, friends lists, and animated and audible character expressions. Customize the game’s interface via XML. Enjoy hundreds of hours of gameplay with new quests, items, and adventures every month.

constellations_other.name: Music and fandom
constellations_other.description: Sometimes fans create their own amazing artworks.

links.description: Rubeo had experience when it came to making the Viking-inspired costumes of the Thor world. She had previously designed the costumes for Warcraft, which features Viking like orcs, knights and mages.

end.title: Avatar
end.creator_credit: James Cameron, Jon Landau, Andrew M. Collins, Billy-Vu Lam, Bruno Parenti, Cameron Coombs, Chris Fregoso, Chris Haney, Chris Radcliffe, Chun Seong Ng, C. Jerome Williams, Gizmo Rivera, Jarrod Avalos, Joe Harkins, Kenneth Quinn Brown, Kim LeBrane, Krystal Sae Eua, Laura Sevilla, Leonardo Martinez, Loeng Wong-Savun, Marco Capparelli, Marcus Erbar, Miguel A. Guerrero, Robert Hubbard, Shigeharu Tomotoshi, Tamer Eldib, T.J. Burke, Tony Meagher, Tulio Hernandez and York N. Schueller
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2009
end.brief_description: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: Warcraft wasn’t Rubeo’s first foray into fantasy. Throughout her career she’s crafted fantastical characters and journeyed to wonderful worlds. Another big CGI epic she was involved with was James Cameron’s record-breaking Avatar.
